channel.title: Rcpp on Brian J. Knaus
channel.description: Recent content in Rcpp on Brian J. Knaus

item.title: CRAN memory error
item.description: I have a package on CRAN where the CRAN tests are reporting a memory error. In order to use the address sanitizer (ASAN) we need to have a version of R that has been compiled specially to make use of it. In a previous post I described how we can use Docker to run rocker images so we do not have to change our system R. I’ve also validated the ASAN is working.
